Wild Shape: Bear

Wild Shape Charge

Assume the shape of a polar bear that can Goad enemies into attacking it. The polar bear has a starting health of 30 Hit points that increase every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom,
